title: ACCURATE 2A Evaluation Board
description:
The ACCURATE 2A Evaluation Board is a development kit designed to facilitate the use and implementation of the CERN-developed ACCURATE 2A state-of-the-art ultra-low current measurement ASIC. It enables current measurement down to the femtoampere range using charge injection or an ADC. The board integrates an Arduino-compatible Microchip SAMD21 microcontroller and a Lattice iCE40 Ultra FPGA for flexible control and measurement.
